item.title: Python and R
item.description: Wow I have always wanted to use python but I have been learning so many helpful things in R! Why don’t we use both with reticulate? I can use R to assign something. library(reticulate) begin<-"This stuff" Then I can use python to assign something else. mid="isn't that hard" print(r.begin,mid) ## ('This stuff', "isn't that hard") Then I can use both to print it out by referring back to R with “r.
